data.description: methods for retreiving RSS data from HTML
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
HTML::RSSAutodiscovery subclasses HTML::Parser and provides a
    simple OOP-ish interface for accessing RSS data from one, or more,
    HTML <link> elements.

    http://nospum.net/HTML-RSSAutodiscovery-1.0.tar.gz
    http://nospum.net/HTML-RSSAutodiscovery.html
